M10Robot:Acceleration.NAME: Acceleration
M10Robot:Acceleration.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Overclock the next !M! cards you play !M10Robot:SecondMagic! times and reshuffle them into your draw pile.

M10Robot:AirRaid.NAME: Air Raid
M10Robot:AirRaid.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X{!M!|>0= + !M!} times.

M10Robot:Ascension.NAME: Ascension
M10Robot:Ascension.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand !M10Robot:SecondMagic! time{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:AssaultField.NAME: Assault Field
M10Robot:AssaultField.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to random enemy !M! times.

M10Robot:AssemblyLine.NAME: Assembly Line
M10Robot:AssemblyLine.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! m10robot:Presents. NL Upgrade all your Orbs !M10Robot:SecondMagic! times.

M10Robot:AttackDown.NAME: Attack Down
M10Robot:AttackDown.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:DefenseDown.NAME: Defense Down
M10Robot:DefenseDown.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:Atomize.NAME: Atomize
M10Robot:Atomize.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lock-On to ALL enemies. NL Channel !M! m10robot:Bombs.

M10Robot:AutoCaster.NAME: Auto Caster
M10Robot:AutoCaster.DESCRIPTION: {@@}The first {!M!|@=Orb|>1=!M! Orbs} you Channel each turn {!M!|@=is|>1=are} Evoked.

M10Robot:BalanceCurrents.NAME: Balance Currents
M10Robot:BalanceCurrents.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a debuff is applied to you, gain !M! Block.

M10Robot:BatteryPack.NAME: Battery Pack
M10Robot:BatteryPack.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M10Robot:SecondMagic! [E] . NL When Retained, increase energy gained by one until played to a max of !M!.

M10Robot:BitMask.NAME: Bitmask
M10Robot:BitMask.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! m10robot:Bit{!M!|>1=s} for each Attack played this turn.

M10Robot:BoosterShot.NAME: Booster Shot
M10Robot:BoosterShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade all your Orbs !M! times.

M10Robot:Byte.NAME: Byte
M10Robot:Byte.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Channel !M! m10robot:Bits.

M10Robot:Compensator.NAME: Compensator
M10Robot:Compensator.DESCRIPTION: REWORK! NL At the end of your turn, reduce m10robot:Recoil by !M!.

M10Robot:CompileData.NAME: Compile Data
M10Robot:CompileData.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Channel !M10Robot:SecondMagic! m10robot:Present{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}. NL Upgrade {!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|@=it|>1=them} !M! time{!M!|>1=s}. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

M10Robot:Concentration.NAME: Deadlock
M10Robot:Concentration.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M10Robot:SecondMagic! m10robot:Scrambled. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:DoubleCaster.NAME: Double Caster
M10Robot:DoubleCaster.DESCRIPTION: {@@}The first {!M!|@=Orb|>1=!M! Orbs} you Evoke each turn {!M!|@=is|>1=are} Evoked twice.

M10Robot:EMP.NAME: EMP
M10Robot:EMP.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! m10robot:Stasis to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:Engage.NAME: Engage
M10Robot:Engage.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply !M! Vulnerable and Lock-On. NL Draw !M10Robot:SecondMagic! card{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:EvasionDown.NAME: Evasion Down
M10Robot:EvasionDown.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and Lock-On to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:FeedForward.NAME: Feed Forward
M10Robot:FeedForward.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage increases by !M! this combat for each subsequent card played this turn.

M10Robot:Filter.NAME: Filter
M10Robot:Filter.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards. NL Gain [E] for each card exhausted this way.

M10Robot:Followup.NAME: Followup
M10Robot:Followup.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Overclock the next {!M!|@=card|>1=!M! cards} you play !M10Robot:SecondMagic! times.

M10Robot:FullAuto.NAME: Full Throttle
M10Robot:FullAuto.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Add !M10Robot:SecondMagic! *Burns into your hand.

M10Robot:HealthDown.NAME: Health Down
M10Robot:HealthDown.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! HP and Max HP.

M10Robot:HomeSweeper.NAME: Home Sweeper
M10Robot:HomeSweeper.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deals !M! more damage per turn passed.

M10Robot:ImaginaryNumbers.NAME: Imaginary Numbers
M10Robot:ImaginaryNumbers.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Strength and temporary Dexterity.

M10Robot:Juggling.NAME: Juggling
M10Robot:Juggling.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, draw an additional card.

M10Robot:LightShow.NAME: Light Show
M10Robot:LightShow.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Channel !M! m10robot:Searchlight{!M!|>1=s} for each Skill played this turn.

M10Robot:Overdrive.NAME: Overdrive Form
M10Robot:Overdrive.DESCRIPTION: At the start of our turn, m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand !M! times.

M10Robot:PerpetualAssembly.NAME: Perpetual Assembly
M10Robot:PerpetualAssembly.DESCRIPTION: {@@}m10robot:Swappable. NL Channel !M! m10robot:Present{!M!|>1=s}. NL Draw !M10Robot:SecondMagic! additional card{!M10Robot:SecondMagic!|>1=s} next turn.

M10Robot:RapidAssembly.NAME: Rapid Assembly
M10Robot:RapidAssembly.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain !M10Robot:SecondMagic! [E] .

M10Robot:PileDriver.NAME: Pile Driver
M10Robot:PileDriver.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to a random other enemy.

M10Robot:PowerSavings.NAME: Power Savings
M10Robot:PowerSavings.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M10Robot:SecondMagic! m10robot:Scrambled. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! [E] .

M10Robot:QuickThinking.NAME: Quick Thinking
M10Robot:QuickThinking.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL Attacks drawn this way cost 0 this turn.

M10Robot:RAMUpgrade.NAME: RAM Upgrade
M10Robot:RAMUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Whenever you Channel an Orb, Upgrade it !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:RecoveryMode.NAME: Recovery Mode
M10Robot:RecoveryMode.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

M10Robot:ReflectiveShell.NAME: Reflective Shell
M10Robot:ReflectiveShell.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Fully blocked attacks are reflected onto the attacker !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:ReturningShield.NAME: Returning Shield
M10Robot:ReturningShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block and draw an additional card.

M10Robot:RoboBeam.NAME: Robo Beam
M10Robot:RoboBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Repeat for every three turns that have passed this combat.

M10Robot:Rumble.NAME: Rumble
M10Robot:Rumble.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain !M! temporary Strength.

M10Robot:Salvo.NAME: Salvo
M10Robot:Salvo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Channeled Orb.

M10Robot:ScrambleField.NAME: Scramble Field
M10Robot:ScrambleField.DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever you would lose HP, lose !M! less.

M10Robot:ScrapeOff.NAME: Scrape Off
M10Robot:ScrapeOff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

M10Robot:SlotConversion.NAME: Slot Conversion
M10Robot:SlotConversion.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL Gain !M! Orb slots.

M10Robot:SpectralCannon.NAME: Spectral Cannon
M10Robot:SpectralCannon.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:SpikyPlating.NAME: Spiker Form
M10Robot:SpikyPlating.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! m10robot:Spikes.

M10Robot:SplitBeam.NAME: Split Beam
M10Robot:SplitBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:TargetingSystem.NAME: Targeting System
M10Robot:TargetingSystem.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the beginning of your turn, apply one Lock-On to a random enemy !M! time{!M!|>1=s}.

M10Robot:ThermalImaging.NAME: Thermal Imaging
M10Robot:ThermalImaging.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Apply !M! Lock-On to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:HeatSeekers.NAME: Heat Seekers
M10Robot:HeatSeekers.DESCRIPTION: m10robot:Swappable. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

M10Robot:ThornField.NAME: Thorn Field
M10Robot:ThornField.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! m10robot:Spikes.

M10Robot:Tinker.NAME: Tinker
M10Robot:Tinker.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade the next {!M!|@=Orb|>1=!M! Orbs} you Channel.

M10Robot:Turbo.NAME: Turbo
M10Robot:Turbo.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next !M! turns, draw an additional card and gain [E] .

M10Robot:WaveGenerator.NAME: Wave Generator
M10Robot:WaveGenerator.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

M10Robot:WeaponPlatform.NAME: Weapon Platform
M10Robot:WeaponPlatform.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies with Lock-On.

M10Robot:WeaponPolish.NAME: Weapon Polish
M10Robot:WeaponPolish.DESCRIPTION: While Equipped: NL Playing an attack boosts its damage by !M! this combat.

M10Robot:WideAngle.NAME: Wide Angle
M10Robot:WideAngle.DESCRIPTION: {@@}When you play an Attack, m10robot:Bits now hit !M! additional time{!M!|>1=s}. NL Channel !M10Robot:SecondMagic! m10robot:Bits.

M10Robot:WindUp.NAME: Wind Up
M10Robot:WindUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase the damage of ALL *Wind *Up cards by !M! this combat.
